question: fictional character whose favorite song was blueberry hill
api_result: The fictional character whose favorite song was "Blueberry Hill" is Vito Corleone from "The Godfather." In the film, Vito Corleone, played by Marlon Brando, is shown enjoying the song "Blueberry Hill" sung by Fats Domino. This detail adds depth to his character, showing a softer, more personal side amidst his role as a powerful mafia boss.
